document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Echo </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Magistrate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Catch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Drop </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Dew </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">free </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">sneer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Follow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">fine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Orion </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">furl </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">your </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Eye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Dazzlingly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">decamping </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">high </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Echo has no magistrate
